hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: Can't find an item? Scan an Amiibo.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Strength Upgrade#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Deku Shield#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Ruto's Letter#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Deku Shield#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that ##the Haunted Wasteland## has #0# major items.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Minuet of Forest# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #the Market#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 4 Bottom

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #the Boomerang#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple Central Bow Target Chest

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that plundering #inside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: Did you know that Ruto is strong enough to defeat enemies and activate ceiling switches inside Jabu Jabu's Belly?

LH (Lab).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #the Serenade of Water#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that shooting #the sun# grants #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Ruto's Letter#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that ##the Graveyard## has #1# major item.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Field# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides the #Market Bazaar#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Gerudo Training Ground final reward# contains #Arrows (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Final Chest

ToT (Right).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #the Serenade of Water#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the way of the hero.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #the Ice Arrows#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Invisible Blades Room

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Fire Keese Chest

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers #Impa's House#.
